definition: body/life/oneself/personally/one's morality and conduct/the main part of a structure or body/pregnant/classifier for sets of clothes: suit, twinset/Kangxi radical 158

sentences.english: Extracting a confession by torture infringes the personal rights of citizens with malice.
sentences.chinese: 刑訊逼供是一種惡意侵犯公民人身權利的違法行爲。

sentences.english: Using is improper, then can seriously encroach is a suspect criminal's personal rights.
sentences.chinese: 運用不當，則會嚴重侵犯涉嫌犯罪者的人身權利。

sentences.english: Infringed the personal rights and freedoms of citizens.
sentences.chinese: 侵犯了公民的人身權利和自由。

sentences.english: Right to birth belongs to human rights, enjoying by a separate man or woman.
sentences.chinese: 生育權爲人身權，由單個自然人享有。

sentences.english: Privacy is an absolute right. It's an important element of citizens personal rights.
sentences.chinese: 隱私權是一項絕對權，是公民人身權的重要內容。

sentences.english: Party A infringes the legal rights of Party B to force labor.
sentences.chinese: 甲方以侵害乙方合法人身權利手段強迫勞動的。

sentences.english: Rights of status are important component of the personal rights system in civil law.
sentences.chinese: 身份權是民法人身權制度的重要組成部分。

sentences.english: Protects victim's personal rights through the concrete legislation.
sentences.chinese: 通過具體的立法來保護被害人的人身權。

sentences.english: Therefore personal right is the main object of kidnapping crime.
sentences.chinese: 人身權利是本罪的主要客體。

sentences.english: Chinese women have gained the important personal right of being able to retain their maiden names.
sentences.chinese: 獨立的姓名權是中國婦女獲得的一項重要人身權利。
